title: A Seed for the Harvest
description: Comfort or sacrifice? Routine or uncertainty? Religion or faith? Jon had a choice to make. He knew the right path, but was it worth it? What difference could he make, anyway? Can one seed bring a harvest? "A Seed for the Harvest" explores the meaning and purpose of Christian faith. Within its pages lies a powerful, challenging story full of diverse, engaging characters whose lives are woven together through times of innocence, depravity, joy, and heartbreak. Winner of the Illumination Book Awards 2015 Enduring Light Silver Medal for Christian Fiction, "A Seed for the Harvest" is an honest, touching, and sometimes humorous portrayal of the transforming power of faith in Jesus Christ.
author: Greg M. Dodd
